title: New champion leaked screenshot, original video leak got taken down.

replies.body:
Why do people have to leak and search for leaks (creating the demand for leaks)?

Can't you just learn some patience?

I never heard any book readers or movie goers or whatever banding up and ask for clips/scripts/storyboard/etc of the sequel even if it's still in production, why are we gamers like this?

............

And really, this champ seems a bit too edgy. Not sure if fake.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Us1KxFPj,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-06-27T07:32:37.644+0000)
>
> Why do people have to leak and search for leaks (creating the demand for leaks)?
> 

People often say that people are more appreciative of things that they wait for, that's just a damn lie for fools to sink their teeth into
so they can learn the concept of "patience"

> [{quoted}](name=Armored Yokai,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Us1KxFPj,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-06-27T07:48:07.075+0000)
>
> People often say that people are more appreciative of things that they wait for, that's just a damn lie for fools to sink their teeth into
> so they can learn the concept of "patience"

lol, so what's the point in getting, playing, seeing and experiencing anything when all you wanna do is just spoiling yourself beforehand? Or having everything rushed out of the door because you just want it now?

That's sad.

Do you need to raid movie studios and read the scripts of all the movies in production, or at least the ones you're interested in? Or read the manuscripts of all the books you're paying attention to? And get an up to date announcement on a production of a game you're waiting for? And do you need everything on your table as soon as you demand it?

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Us1KxFPj,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-06-27T08:01:28.121+0000)
>
> lol, so what's the point in getting, playing, seeing and experiencing anything when all you wanna do is just spoiling yourself beforehand? Or having everything rushed out of the door because you just want it now?
> 
> That's sad.
> 
> Do you need to raid movie studios and read the scripts of all the movies in production, or at least the ones you're interested in? Or read the manuscripts of all the books you're paying attention to? And get an up to date announcement on a production of a game you're waiting for? And do you need everything on your table as soon as you demand it?

Movies/Books are something that only last a few months once released and are just "dreams" screens and paper, Champions are something you can play as and do whatever you want with them and they take a 1-2 months to build and give you more variety on game-play, i honestly think we need 25 more champions for this year, but that's only my opinion
Movies and books aren't video games?
So this new champion is the assassin jungle teased in the ask riot? And since he collects souls like thresh does this also mean he's another corrupted soul in the shadow isle.
Such a lust for leaks... whooooo?!
Well I've just seen the video, he looks like Tryndamere, reminds me of Soul Eater (anime), and also looks like a Darkin!
He's a champion that apparently can either turn into Tryndamere or Yasuo, depending on the situation.
I was wondering which champion to spend IP on. I guess I am waiting till he is released. New champs are 7800 IP on release right ?

> [{quoted}](name=Cryo00,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Us1KxFPj,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-06-27T08:58:26.256+0000)
>
> I was wondering which champion to spend IP on. I guess I am waiting till he is released. New champs are 7800 IP on release right ?

Yep. The first two weeks.
i saw that they had a dash and i lost a lot of interest ngl
